channel.title: Black Mesa interviews...
channel.description:
I thought It'd be a nice feature to have all the interviews and media coverage pertaining to Black Mesa in one place. And it might be fun to read through some of the older interviews as well :slight_smile:
It's nothing special, but it might be handy to have them all in one place.
[url='https://www.gamespot.com/pages/unions/forums/show_msgs.php?topic_id=21491115&union_id=55']https://www.gamespot.com/pages/unions/forum...amp;union_id=55[/url] June 11, 2005
[url='https://www.hlfallout.net/articles.php/interview_69/']https://www.hlfallout.net/articles.php/interview_69/[/url] August 6, 2005
[url='https://www.hlcomic.com/extras/?p=119']https://www.hlcomic.com/extras/?p=119[/url] March 20, 2006
[url]https://planethalflife.gamespy.com/View.php?view=Interviews.Detail&id=63[/url] September 12, 2006
[url]https://www.yougamers.com/articles/8207_black_mesa_interview/[/url] July 23, 2007
[url]https://www.moddb.com/groups/developer-banter/features/developer-banter-black-mesa-source[/url] December 26, 2008
[url]https://resolution-magazine.co.uk/issue2/preview_blackmesa.htm[/url] January 2009
[url]https://www.digitalspy.com/gaming/a144179/diy-developing-the-black-mesa-project.html[/url] January 2009
[url]https://www.square-go.com/feature/422[/url] February 2, 2009
[url]https://blogs.theage.com.au/digital-life/screenplay/2009/02/16/yourturnretur.html[/url] February 16, 2009 [url]https://blogs.theage.com.au/screenplay/archives//011549.html[/url] February 17, 2009
[url]https://www.moddb.com/groups/game-developers-club-source/features/hands-on-ep-1-writing-ft-ben-truman[/url] April 2009
[url=https://www.atomicmpc.com.au/Feature/230583,is-black-mesa-the-ultimate-half-life-2-mod.aspx]https://www.atomicmpc.com.au/Feature/230583,is-black-mesa-the-ultimate-half-life-2-mod.aspx[/url] August 31, 2010
Magazine scans:
[img]https://img36.imageshack.us/img36/6616/nsabms1.jpg[/img] [img]https://img36.imageshack.us/img36/1412/nsabms2.jpg[/img] [img]https://img142.imageshack.us/img142/9362/nsabms3.jpg[/img] [img]https://img264.imageshack.us/img264/6154/bmspcguk2.jpg[/img] [img]https://img29.imageshack.us/img29/496/mr3gamestarbms.jpg[/img] [img]https://img691.imageshack.us/img691/8276/pcppbms1.jpg[/img] [img]https://img691.imageshack.us/img691/8499/200902pczone.jpg[/img] On sale 13 January 2010; [img]https://img63.imageshack.us/img63/6814/pcpp174cover.jpg[/img]
This one is a PDF from natedgreat's website, I hope it's alright to link to it? [url]https://www.natedgreat3.com/htmlSite/Images/CGWmagIssue257.pdf[/url]
Link to Catzeyes93' website with LOTS of pics pertaining to Black Mesa's development: [url]https://www.catzeyes93.com/images/BlackMesa/index.html[/url]
If anyone still has some great Black Mesa interviews or magazine scans please post them here or PM me so I can put them in the first post.
Enjoy :stuck_out_tongue:
EDIT: I'll continue to update the list as I find more interviews.

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
devs HAVE to read the forum posts

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...
item.dc:creator: henry132
item.description:
Defender:

Can everyone please stop posting on these forums? It’s obviously too much for the devs to develop AND look at forum posts. Can we please let them concentrate on one thing only and start on the game mod?

Oh, btw… read the sig! LOL

Nobody’s ever said that any dev HAS to read the forum posts.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Bathroom Security:

Sorry for necropost. But, I think once the mod is out, we can ask them all we want and they’ll finally answer everything

4 days is hardly a necro. 5 months on the other hand… (I’m looking at you, Minotaur!)

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...
item.dc:creator: Bathroom_Security
item.description:
The Minotaur:

I wonder if they’re gonna post a development diary or something when they release. It would be interesting to see why they thought they would finish it, and why it ended up taking so much longer.

Sorry for necropost. But, I think once the mod is out, we can ask them all we want and they’ll finally answer everything

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...
item.dc:creator: That_Happy_Chum
item.description:
I believe the release date being missed was mostly due to personal events which took priority over the mod, and the delay has been extended to polish the game to perfection. The initial date could have also been a little overambitious.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa interviews...

item.description:
I wonder if they’re gonna post a development diary or something when they release. It would be interesting to see why they thought they would finish it, and why it ended up taking so much longer.

item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
eXpressionist:

kian, that’s leaked Black Mesa Source alpha, approx 2006.
I think, that creators of this mod was almost ready in the end of the last year, but no one knows why did they freezed the developing for such long time.

They didn’t “freeze” anything, they simply weren’t (aren’t) ready.

Read full topic
